accounts.title: User Authentication with Auth0
accounts.text_2: Want to see auth0 and meteor-accounts in action? click on "Set Auth0!!" on this card.
accounts.text_3: Want to see auth0 and meteor-accounts in action? click on "Log me in!!" on this card.
accounts.text_4: Want to see auth0 and meteor-accounts in action? deploy mongol "ctrl+m". Now you can use Meteor.user() and Meteor.userId() on Client and server side.

installed.title: Meteor and vuetify are now installed!!
installed.text_1: This is an example of vuetify's v-card
installed.text_2: Want to see Meteor's Real Time Subscription in action? Open me in another tab and click on "CLICK ME!!" on this card.

i18n.title: Internationalization (i18n)
i18n.text_1: Want to see Internationalization in action? Select your language below.

plugins.title: Page Router and State Management
plugins.see_in_action: Want to see VueRouter and Vuex in action? Click on "Change route!!" on this card and watch the breadcrumbs above.

confirm.title: EventBus and Custom Confirm Dialogs
confirm.text_1: Listen to events in the DOM with EventBus.
confirm.text_2: Want to see EventBus and Confirm Dialogs in action? click on "Show!!" on this card.

snack.title: Notifications with SnackBar
snack.text_1: Vuetify Snackbars are great for users notifications!!
snack.text_2: Want to see SnackBars in action? Click on "Show" buttons on this card

about.title: This is an example, so you can see a little piece of what vue-router and vuex can do.
about.li_1: Click on back button in your browser. Thats Vue-router history mode.
about.li_2: Open Left Navigation Drawer and go to home page.
about.li_3: Use breadcrumbs above to navigate. We store breadcrumbs globally using vuex. You can use Vuex to store anything in a global scope.

errors.emailRequired: A proper email address is required

auth.removeUserForSure: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
